Reviews.Title: “Great value for money and great location.”
Reviews.Author: MajesticSeacow
Reviews.Content: read fair reviews booking hotel decided book based review below dont moan 5 minutes couldnt true surprises people expect 5 hotels honestly advertised dont mc donalds rump steak champagne 2 hotel money 2 hotel expecting clean basic actually overwhelmed quality lovely corner balconies overlooking plaza street bed linen clean crisp changed daily bathroom clean modern staff help settle barcelona quick help nice restaurants bars breakfast colossal bearing mind price paid thrilled quality werent blessed weather stay didnt windows night expected traffic noise bearing mind hotel sits road leads placa de catalunya busiest intersections city staying centre european cities usually noisy thats nature city living cant cake eat near attractions barcelona nutshell story busy european cities dont spend fortune happy stay amongst hustle bustle near major attractions basic clean hotel perfect silent nights sleep cooked breakfast morning pay bit stay outside city centre

Reviews.Title: “Unclean, smelly and expensive”
Reviews.Author: ignacio_valdecasas
Reviews.Content: ive recently stay hotel nights time experience service location excellent value price quality onebed wasnt space fit suitcase floor breakfast toasts juice fruit coffee espectacular clean issue wall boogers toilet urine spits worktop toilet sticky believe furthermore strange smell told due smell didnt leave stay smelled kitchen couldnt window connected inside natural light definitively im thinking coming

Reviews.Title: “won't stay here again”
Reviews.Author: oladunk123
Reviews.Content: stayed disappointing hotels stayed expected 2star hotel locations hotel short walk plaza rambla short distance l1 metro line beds towels day breakfast theres lovely local eat bad noise street isnt bad fair bit traffic day night youre sensitive sound fresh air sleeping look elsewhere walls thin sound travels easily beds rock hard bathroom cleaning horrible dirty visible advertise free wifi wifi poor impossible access properly time able 5 shrugged directed internet cafe

Reviews.Title: “Clean basic hotel in fantastic location”
Reviews.Author: farrahmu
Reviews.Content: weekend feb 1012 2012 location hotel magnificent hotel annoyingly noisy night inward facing dead quiet outside hustle bustle walls extremely paper thin hear surrounding halls etc blame hotel guests lack sleep wasnt entirely sealed ie door gaps peer hall massive holes noticeable gaps wedged towel bottom door drown hall lights night unfortunately sound clean impressive basic terms amenities pay hot water run 5 minutes warm shower

Reviews.Title: “great location . nice place to stay if you dont moan every 2 mins”
Reviews.Author: reddevilChesterfield
Reviews.Content: basically stay using head found guys reception ok trustworthy breakfast didnt bother cant comment ok 5 star paying 5 star money location hotel tapas restaurant road eve found reasonable 5 mins walk las ramblas plaza de catalunya airport bus stops outside hotel costs 5 euros 75 cents person 30 min walk le segrada familia 30 mins ramblas beach slow pace course found tube easy costs unlimited 2 days pay overall holiday tomorrow hope review helps

Reviews.Title: “Good Location but not a great hotel”
Reviews.Author: Tina778
Reviews.Content: location hotel main selling unfortunatly clean walls paper thin person door flushes loo hear breakfast dry bread croisants etc getting breakfast outside expensive fresher walk little restuarants corner hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good basic hotel, Barcelona centre”
Reviews.Author: Willgo23
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights mid september 2 hotel reception folks helpful allocated 404 top floor view university owner gradually improved hotel past 2 flat screen tvs aware traffic noise clean bed comfy walls thin sound proofing hear conversation besides adjacent warned night resident 405 tv volume loud 1200 phoned reception immediately solved difficulty breakfast usual continental buffet fare located basic dining canteen floor 2 busy morning found breakfast started day lots restaurants cafes immediate particularly liked door adjacent university stop metro cheapest city 10 journey ticket 850 euros 5 minutes walk las ramblas shopping quarter etc

Reviews.Title: “Spotless, no frills accomodation in fantastic location”
Reviews.Author: GingeEnTonic
Reviews.Content: staff friendly provided service answered questions basic bathroom decor immaculate position hotel placa de catalunya top busses start theres lots shops cafes restaurants light sleeper edge busy road breakfast included hot drinks orange juice yogurts toast cheese salami croissants cakes cereals money spent excellent experience hotel definitely return barcelona

Reviews.Title: “Not worth the money. Save and get a better hotel.”

Reviews.Content: hotel located close metro positive hotel beds terrible feel spings poor sound insulation hear noises street night noises stairs people coming brekfast ok regarding quality choice limited regards francesco

Reviews.Title: “A Nice Place To Stay”
Reviews.Author: Stella911
Reviews.Content: hotel overall okay stay shops restaurants internet cafes corner recommend restaurant called cent fox 1 minute walk hotel food absolutely delicious 3 course meal 8 euro 15 aud value concierge bit firstthe service wasnt badwe blankets pillows call concierge reinforce shower call help water warm using hot water time wait fixed helpful overall experience hotel 35

Reviews.Title: “Excellent For Value and Location”
Reviews.Author: DaveLSheffield Posted by an OctopusTravel traveler
Reviews.Content: party senior couples hotel nicely located close sights clean warm staff friendly helpful adequate satisfied breakfast covered everyones dietary plenty looking swimming gyms look elsewhere stay
